name: One Year of Gratitude
loreDescription: Orbis has completed one long orbit around Ilryos. To convey their feelings of gratitude to Heirs for protecting Orbis all that time, Ras brings a gift, wrapped by Arky, and a letter, written by Mercedes.

skillDescription.base: Increases the EXP acquired by Heroes in the team by 10%. This effect will not be applied when used via a supporter. The skill effect of this Artifact does not increase when enhanced.
